channel.title: Re-organizing MySQL Table
channel.description:
[code]I was just wondering if there was a way to re-organize the contents of a MySQL Table. I know that you can have it displayed in a certain order by doing [code] SELECT * FROM employees ORDER BY name ASC [/code] as an example, if the table contained rows:
James Alicia Michael Robert
and i did that, it would spit out [quote] Alicia James Michael Robert [/code] But is there a way to ALTER the table, so that the new order, becomes the default order? I am planning on using this in order for NpcDialogues for my server, in case you're wondering.

item.title: Re-organizing MySQL Table
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[code]I was just wondering if there was a way to re-organize the contents of a MySQL Table. I know that you can have it displayed in a certain order by doing

SELECT * FROM employees ORDER BY name ASC

as an example, if the table contained rows:

James Alicia Michael Robert

and i did that, it would spit out

[quote]
Alicia
James
Michael
Robert
[/code]

But is there a way to ALTER the table, so that the new order, becomes the default order? I am planning on using this in order for NpcDialogues for my server, in case youâ€™re wondering.
